events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position through our online portal, providing a detailed resume and cover letter.
The sourcing team reviewed the candidate's profile and categorized the application under Engineering based on their software development experience.
Recruiter John Smith was assigned to manage the candidate’s progress and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
John conducted a phone screening and found the candidate to have a strong foundation in coding and system design, well aligned with the role requirements.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the role and availability for the next stage technical interview.
The technical interview was scheduled for June 5th at 10 AM with the senior engineering panel to assess the candidate’s programming and problem-solving skills.
The candidate demonstrated excellent coding skills and system architecture knowledge during the technical interview, impressing the engineering team.
Following a successful technical interview, the HR interview was scheduled for June 7th to discuss compensation and cultural fit.
The HR interview went well; the candidate aligned with company values and salary expectations were discussed openly and positively.
A formal offer was extended to the candidate via email including salary, benefits, and start date options.
The candidate expressed excitement and gratitude upon receiving the offer, requesting a short time period to consider it thoroughly.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming the agreed salary and the proposed start date next month.
The new hire completed their onboarding paperwork and attended orientation sessions to get started with their role as software engineer.
The hiring process was successfully closed after the candidate completed all onboarding steps and began contributing to their first engineering project.
